thread.title: School closings in Central NY: There are some delays and closings, Friday Dec. 13
thread.title_full: School closings in Central NY: There are some delays and closings, Friday Dec. 13

author: Brenda Duncan | bduncan@syracuse.com
title: School closings in Central NY: There are some delays and closings, Friday Dec. 13
text:
Some schools have made announcements due to the weather. So far, it’s only those north of Syracuse.
Our information comes directly from school officials, school websites and news reports. We’ll continue to update the list as it changes.
Can’t see the closings list? Visit our [School Closings and Delays page](https://www.syracuse.com/schools/index.ssf/page/school-closings.html)
Contact us about school closings anytime: 315-470-2265 | [Email ](mailto:citynews@syracuse.com)
Central New York schools
